My name’s Shaun Fox, and this is my portfolio.

 

Hello, I'm Shaun. I'm a designer living in Austin, TX, with my beautiful wife and daughter. I have a BFA in Communication Design from Texas State University.

I'm a designer for The Austin Stone Community Church.
You can find me on twitter and I've started to post things on my blog again.

I love typography, reading, logo design, playing the guitar, design for social causes, organic gardening, and binding little books for myself and my friends.

Hover over the images for a moment to learn a little more about the projects. If you have questions I'll be happy to answer them.

Don’t be shy, Say Hello!
Want to know more? (pdf resumé)
